crossbar_listing.map: function(doc) { if ( doc.pvt_type != 'acdc_stat' || doc.pvt_deleted ) return; emit(doc.pvt_created, {'recorded_at':doc.recorded_at, 'queues':doc.queues, 'agents':doc.agents}); }

stats_per_queue.map: function(doc) { if ( doc.pvt_type != 'acdc_stat' || doc.pvt_deleted ) return; for (q in doc.queues) { var data = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(doc.queues[q])); data.recorded_at = doc.recorded_at; emit([q, doc.recorded_at], data); } }

stats_per_agent.map: function(doc) { if ( doc.pvt_type != 'acdc_stat' || doc.pvt_deleted ) return; for (a in doc.agents) { var data = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(doc.agents[a])); data.recorded_at = doc.recorded_at; emit([a, doc.recorded_at], data); } }

stats_per_agent_by_time.map: function(doc) { if ( doc.pvt_type != 'acdc_stat' || doc.pvt_deleted ) return; for (a in doc.agents) { var data = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(doc.agents[a])); data.recorded_at = doc.recorded_at; emit([doc.recorded_at, a], data); } }

stats_per_queue_by_time.map: function(doc) { if ( doc.pvt_type != 'acdc_stat' || doc.pvt_deleted ) return; for (q in doc.queues) { var data = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(doc.queues[q])); data.recorded_at = doc.recorded_at; emit([doc.recorded_at, q], data); } }
